SEARCH
Package it.polimi.ingsw.model

Class ShapeCommonGoal

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.CommonGoal
it.polimi.ingsw.model.ShapeCommonGoal
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class ShapeCommonGoal extends CommonGoal implements Serializable
ShapeCommonGoal is a class that represents a generic CommonGoal which is satisfied if the BookShelf contains a particular shape of the same tile type. TODO
Since:
03/04/2023

Version:
2.0
Author:
Tommaso Trabacchin, Melanie Tonarelli, Emanuele Valsecchi, Adem Shehi

  • Method Details

    • getRuleShape

      public List<Integer[]> getRuleShape()
      Method that return the ruleShape list.
      Returns:
      the list of arrays that contains the offsets that permit to implement for more detailed explanation. For more click here: [incrementRuleShape]

    • setRuleShape

      public void setRuleShape(List<Integer[]> ruleShape)
      Method that sets the ruleShape list.
      Parameters:
      ruleShape - list of integer that needs to set the value of [incrementRuleshape]

    • rule

      public List<EntryPatternGoal> rule(TileType[][] bookShelf)
      The method returns null if the ShapeCommonGoal is not satisfied for the bookShelf passed as argument.
      Specified by:
      rule in class CommonGoal
      Parameters:
      bookShelf - the BookShelf to check for the ShapeCommonGoal
      Returns:
      null if the ShapeCommonGoal is satisfied, otherwise the list of the EntryPatternGoals representing the tiles in the BookShelf that satisfy the ShapeCommonGoal

    • verifyInField

      private boolean verifyInField(int maxColumnDim, int maxRowDim, int indexColumn, int indexRow, List<Integer[]> ruleCopy)
      This method checks if the starting coordinate and the offsets in the ruleShape list are within the bounds of the bookshelf.
      Parameters:
      maxColumnDim - It is the length of the bookshelf, tells where is the vertical limit to check for tails.
      maxRowDim - It is the width of the bookshelf, tells where is the horizontal limit to check for tails.
      indexColumn - It is the index of column of the current element being verified
      indexRow - It is the index of row of the current element being verified
      Returns:
      True if an element with indexes (i,j), added to the corresponding array of the list incrementRuleShape
      See Also:
      • ruleShape

    • verifySurrounding

      private boolean verifySurrounding(List<EntryPatternGoal> candidate, TileType[][] bookShelf)
      This is a support method used to help in the search of the commonGoal grouped in this class.
      Parameters:
      candidate - Is a list of tails inside the bookshelf that is candidate to be one the 3 shapes that permit to score CommonGoal
      bookShelf - It is the same bookShelf being passed as parameter to the rule method
      Returns:
      If around the exact shape needed to be done there is another tail of the same type.

    • notInShape

      private boolean notInShape(int row, int column, List<EntryPatternGoal> candidate)
      Method used to check if Starting at the index of the bookshelf (row, column)
      we have a CommonGoal of the one grouped in this class or not.
      Parameters:
      row - The index of the Row
      column - The index of the Column
      candidate - A shape of the one grouped in this class to be achieved
      Returns:
      True if the CommonGoal is Achieved and False Otherwise.

    • insideBookshelfBound

      private boolean insideBookshelfBound(int row, int column, int maxHeight, int maxWidth)

      Boolean method to check if the initial coordinate allows a commomGoal or not. We can make this simple control just by comparing the possibility to have a commonGoal of the one we check with this class and the size of the bookshelf.

      Parameters:
      row - it is the row index of the element to check
      column - it is the column index of the element to check
      maxHeight - It is the maximum column index being allowed (Bookshelf Height)
      maxWidth - It is the maximum row index being allowed (Bookshelf Width)
      Returns:
      True If an element with index row, column is part of the bookshelf and False Otherwise.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Overriding toString() default method.
      Overrides:
      toString in class CommonGoal
      Returns:
      a String representing the ShapeCommonGoal.
